channel.title: tomcat on htr3n's

item.title: Making JSP work with Spring Boot 2
item.description: One of my past projects relied heavily on XML based configurations and JSP technologies dated back to Spring Framework 3.x. It is still working fine after upgrading to Spring 5 and corresponding dependent libraries such as Hibernate 5, HikariCP 3 and Apache CXF 3.
